page.title: 19INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: The Tregoniggie Industrial Estate is a small collection of manufacturing units set in their own landscaped grounds just outside Falmouth. {Watson Marlow}make parts for kidney machines and employ about two hundred people.They established themselves on this site fifteen years ago and occupy eleven acres. {Phi Magnetronics}make tape recording heads for aircraft flight recorders and employ 35 people.They have recently sent an order of their newest design to Brazil at Â£1500 each. {Thorn E.M.I.}also have space on the estate, as do{Delta Graphics, {County Kitchens}and{Roffs Print,}from where we occasionally collect unwanted paper which we can use as drawing paper.
